name: Space Fuss
description: Action-strategy game, about space hobo, who had his cardboard box stolen.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: anything with Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or nVidia with at least 256 mb of memory, or Intel GMA 950 + Storage: 220 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: anything with Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI or nVidia with at least 512 mb of memory Storage: 220 MB available space
